name: Cozy & Relaxing Suite: Pool/Movie Screen/Trails

reviews.comments: Enjoyed our stay here! It was in a perfect location near downtown and all the biking trails. Clean place. Adam was very communicative through the entire process and made the stay enjoyable. If we ever come back to NWA, we'll be sure to see if this place is available.
reviews.response: We were so happy to welcome you! Please come back anytime!

reviews.comments:
The house, amenities and location were great. The bedroom, living room, kitchen and bathroom were clean and well appointed. The a/v media center was fun for catching up on shows and the back porch was a plus for gearing up for the rides. Adam is an excellent host that made our trip easy and enjoyable with his timely communication and well appointed accommodations. Thanks for the Red Bull and popcorn! 

We spent three days riding Slaughter Pen and Coler trails. It's a short warm up ride into town, then to the trails in either direction. Check out Wrights BBQ and the Airship coffee shop only accessible by bike or walking in the woods. It's a nice base to meet up at if you're riding the Coler trails.
reviews.response: Thank you for visiting! It was our pleasure to welcome you. :-)

reviews.comments: This place is amazing in terms of value, closeness to downtown and any of the bentonville trails and restaurants you could ever want to hit, nice and quiet neighborhood. Adam is very responsive with any questions or concerns that we had and was able to get us a couple of things that we needed for the room in a matter of hours. Highly recommended!

Adam’s place was great! It is spotless and exactly like the pictures. We appreciated the thoughtful touches such as treats in the refrigerator and special products. I look forward to staying there again.
reviews.response: Thank you Robin! It was a pleasure to welcome you to NWA and please come back anytime you are in the area!

reviews.comments: Adam’s place was clean, In a fantastic location if your biking, and had a bunch of extras you can try.  I got introduced to Honey Mama chocolate bars while staying here and don’t know how I’ve survived without them.  Excellent value for the place.
reviews.response: Thanks Shaun! It was a pleasure to welcome you, and you are quite right about the Honey Mamas!

reviews.comments: This was so beautiful, peaceful, and cozy. Would love to stay again
reviews.response: Thank you Angie! It was a pleasure to welcome you!

reviews.comments:
This place was so cute and fun, and well thought out. They had well thought out layout and fun touches throughout the home. I think my favorite part was amount of places you could charge any device, normally that’s a struggle and there were so many through the home. 

We didn’t have time to use like TVs or movie area but they are there. Hopefully another visit to be able to use the hammock area. 

If you’re going to visit plan to be there more than a day, you won’t regret it
reviews.response: Thanks so much Natasha! It was a pleasure to welcome you!

reviews.comments: ***THIS IS THE PLACE TO STAY WHILE IN BENTONVILLE*** Adam and his family are great hosts and provide a wonderful space to stay while visiting. The amenities really take it to the next level and make the stay that much more comforting. If you are in town to mountain bike the ride is next to nothing as slaughter pen is pretty much across from the subdivision. It’s also close to the downtown and square area making that a quick commute.
reviews.response: Thank you so much Dominick for the kind words! It was our great pleasure to welcome you!

reviews.comments: It was a perfect stay very close to all the great food and museums. Adam was very communicative and the house hand book was very thorough making it a fun and easy stay.
reviews.response: Thank you so much Jasmine! It was a great pleasure to have you in our space!

reviews.comments: This place was very clean and very comfortable. Highly recommend if coming to NWA.

listingAmenities.description: Space where guests can cook their own meals
listingAmenities.name: Kitchen

listingAmenities.description: Guests have a desk or table that’s used just for working, along with a comfortable chair.
listingAmenities.name: Dedicated workspace

listingAmenities.description: Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
listingAmenities.name: Essentials

listingAmenities.description: An open space on the property usually covered in grass
listingAmenities.name: Backyard

listingAmenities.description: Check yourself into the home with a door code
listingAmenities.name: Keypad

photos.caption: Relax poolside after a day of exploring all Bentonville has to offer!
Enjoy a private outdoor patio for a coffee in the morning or watch the sunset with an evening cocktail.
The view from the kitchen area showcasing the natural light of the space and flowing into the bedroom.

Smart Home Theater with surround sound. Hulu, Disney+, Paramount Plus, Prime Video, 900+ films & tv shows on Vudu and more are available for your use (or you can use your own Netflix account). We do not have Cable.
Your bedroom has an amazingly comfortable queen Muse Sleep bed as well as a 43-Inch Smart TV to allow you to unwind and relax.
Fun bicycle themed art accents your kitchenette and dining area with everything you need!
Get comfortable, enjoy a book or a cup of coffee along with some complimentary snacks to help you relax in the space.
Your coffee nook is the perfect spot for Keurig or Drip coffee, and we have a complimentary selection of coffee and tea for your enjoyment during your stay.
A gas fireplace anchors your living space with patio access and lots of natural light.
Natural light fills the bedroom with a view of the firepit and pool area. And don't worry, those are blackout curtains!
A full length mirror and hanging storage makes getting ready a snap!
A simple workspace to send a few emails or catch up on the to do list before relaxing for the evening along with a comfortable seating area and rustic decor.
View from the bedroom door showing the private bath entrance, kitchenette, comfortable seating and the working fireplace which is to the right.
The couch pulls out to a queen bed with room to spare and allows room for up to 4 adults.
Your full private bathroom has plenty of fresh towels and linens.
Shower and vanity with all the toiletries you might need.
A firepit is perfect for a chilly night in NWA! Roast hotdogs or a smore and enjoy the view!
Enjoy the view from the fire pit and see nature all around you!
Your poolside view!
Tons of natural beauty surround the patio and backyard.
Cox Preferred 250 MegaBit internet available for your use.
Exterior Patio on the lower level and seasonal pool access.
Relax by the pool and enjoy a cool drink and watch the sunset.
North Walton Trail at the base of our neighborhood. Direct access to Slaughter Pen, the Back 40, Little Sugar, Coler Creek, and the rest of Bentonville beyond.
North Walton Trail connecting to the front of the neighborhood for quick access to amenities around town.
Whether you are a serious trail rider or just looking for some fun, we have trails to suit your needs within just a few minutes!
"Buckyball" is one of many outdoor art pieces all throughout Bentonville. This is not to be missed after sunset!
Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art is enough to keep you busy for weeks without seeing it all!
The Momentary is a modern museum and event space that always has something surprising in store!
The Scott Family Amazeum is a world class children's museum near Crystal Bridges.
The Bentonville Square is a place for excitement and fun, as well as beauty and simple people watching.
Coler Creek Preserve and Slaughter Pen Mountain Bike Park are both within 2 miles of our neighborhood with easy access!
The Museum of Native American History is a hidden gem of Bentonville! Don't miss this informative and free option!
Downtown Bentonville is full of life and little surprises! Make sure to step inside the Walton 5 & Dime for a step back into the past!

primaryHost.about:
Hello from Northwest Arkansas!

My name is Adam and I'm a small business owner based in Bentonville, Arkansas. Having been bitten with the entrepreneurial bug, my wife Angela and I became AirBNB hosts and have loved welcoming and meeting so many interesting people from all over the world!

I love books, good music, movies, mountain biking and exploring. My wife and I blog at Grassfedmama•com, own a tutoring company and a clothing brand (CaveCloth•com) and always seem to have multiple irons in the fire!

Please feel free to look over reviews from our previous guests or reach out with any questions you might have. We hope to welcome you soon!
primaryHost.name: Adam

sectionedDescription.access:
Access your guest suite is through your private rear entrance in the house (accessed through the backyard garden by the pool). You enter through the side gate and walk around the house to the rear door where you'll find the door with keypad ready for you. The backyard, patio, fire pit and pool area are available to you during your stay. We work from home so we are often on site and available to you if needed. 

Our backyard is available during your stay for registered guests only. You will enjoy the pool, decks, and patio with shade that changes throughout the day. You may use any pool supplies you find in your suite or stored next to the pool. Please keep in mind that this is a residential neighborhood while listening to music or utilizing the outdoor areas and that the backyard is a shared space with our family.
sectionedDescription.description:
A sparkling clean & cozy basement guest suite with private bedroom, living area, kitchenette, private bathroom, outdoor patio and seasonal pool access. A quiet neighborhood backing up to woods and hills but only minutes from all NWA has to offer. Crystal Bridges Museum, Wal-Mart Amp, walking/biking trails, quaint downtown areas, great restaurants, and more. Direct neighborhood access to trails and the Razorback Greenway.

We are sure you'll love Bentonville and our neighborhood as much as we do!

ADDRESSING COVID-19: We take great care in the cleaning of our guest space, and we have further increased our process to follow Airbnb’s enhanced cleaning protocol, which was developed with expert guidance. Here are a few highlights:

• We sanitize high-touch surfaces, down to the doorknob
• We use cleaners and disinfectants approved by global health agencies, and we wear protective gear to help prevent cross-contamination
• We clean each room using extensive cleaning checklists
• We provide extra cleaning supplies, so you can clean as you stay
• We comply with local Arkansas and Bentonville laws, including any additional safety or cleaning guidelines

With over 350 “Sparkling Clean” ratings you can see that your health and safety is our #1 priority and that we take it seriously!

This rustic industrial guest suite has a separate private entrance and has a dedicated parking spot. Super clean and with many extra touches, this 600 square foot suite is comfortable & inviting from the moment you walk in. 

The guest suite eat in kitchenette includes a microwave, Keurig and drip coffee makers, sink, mini refrigerator/freezer, toaster, electric skillet, electric kettle, crock pot, and blender. Bottled water as well as a selection of coffee, tea, and snacks are provided. Additional cleaning supplies are kept under the sink for your use during your stay should you need them. 

A comfortable living area with a gas fireplace where you can relax and unwind is equipped with a large projection screen TV (over 100 inches!) and stereo with sub-woofer for movie night. We include complementary Hulu, Disney+, Paramount Plus, & Prime Video for your use, as well as over 900 films in our personal digital movie collection.

If you need to get some work done, the dedicated desk space is ready for you, along with 150 Megabit internet for your use. The couch pulls out to a queen size bed allowing for space for up to 4 adults. 

Private bathroom with all the linens you'll need. And of course, a comfortable private bedroom with a 43” 4K smart TV to rest and relax after a day of adventuring! 

A large back deck and patio with bistro style lighting to enjoy your morning coffee on or use the fire pit on a cool night.  When in season (early May to Late September) the pool is available for your use.

The space is kid friendly, and we have a pack and play crib available upon request. 

No pets, smoking, or events at any time on property please. Only registered guests are allowed on site for liability reasons.

PLEASE NOTE:  The guest suite is the lowest level of our house and does connect by interior staircase to the rest of the home. We respect our guest's privacy, but note that we may hear each other or pass in the yard or entrance to your area. The backyard area and pool are shared spaces with our family. 

The pool has been closed for the season and will be reopen in late April 2022. 

Being on the lower floor of our home, this space is not ideal for someone who is a very light sleeper or sensitive to everyday household sounds (walking, kids playing, etc).

Access your guest suite is through your private rear entrance in the house (accessed through the backyard garden by the pool). You enter through the side gate and walk around the house to the rear door where you'll find the door with keypad ready for you. The backyard, patio, fire pit and pool area are available to you during your stay. We work from home so we are often on site and available to you if needed. 

Our backyard is available during your stay for registered guests only. You will enjoy the pool, decks, and patio with shade that changes throughout the day. You may use any pool supplies you find in your suite or stored next to the pool. Please keep in mind that this is a residential neighborhood while listening to music or utilizing the outdoor areas and that the backyard is a shared space with our family.

We live on property and work from home, so we are easily available during your stay for anything you need by the AirBNB app, as well as phone or text. We enjoy getting to know our guests, but our guest space has a separate entrance so you won't need to interact with us unless you need or desire to. Especially during good weather we may meet in the back yard or pool area and we’ll be so pleased to welcome you!

Bentonville is an amazing area best known for its southern culture, cuisine, art, and outdoor activities. Our neighborhood has direct access to the Slaughter Pen Mountain Biking park and the Razorback Greenway (Less than a 10 minute bike ride away). Coler Mountain, the Back 40, and Little Sugar network are all within a short ride or drive from the neighborhood.

You are within a 10 minute drive of Walmart and Sam's Club corporate offices, Downtown Bentonville, the Amazeum Children's Museum, Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art, The Momentary Museum, Museum of Native American History, and more!  There's honestly too much to list, as this area truly has it all!

Our neighborhood is very family friendly, with children often riding and playing in yards. So be mindful when coming and going for children, especially when backing out of the driveway.

Bentonville is easy to get around thankfully! Most amenities are a short drive or even a short bike ride away. Uber & Lyft are also readily available.

MORE ABOUT THIS HOME :
We aim for a very comfortable and inviting stay for our guests. We love this location because we are close to and have easy access to everything in the area.

This suite is ideal for guests who want more space and room to stretch out, outside living spaces, and a relaxing atmosphere and neighborhood while still being close to the action. A great fit for couples, small families, and small groups. Very convenient for business travelers wanting a place to do some work in comfort as well as very close access to the Wal-Mart and Sam's Club Home Offices, Mercy Northwest Hospital, and Northwest Medical Center.
 
Bentonville has a number of fabulous restaurants. Based on your taste preferences we would be more than happy to make recommendations, or if you feel like staying in, you're more than welcome to enjoy take out options or a meal in your suite.

NWA and Bentonville specifically are rated among the very best in North America for mountain biking trails. Our neighborhood connects directly to the trail network and we are less than 1 mile from the Razorback Greenway,  while Coler Mountain,  Slaughter Pen, the Back 40, and Little Sugar trail systems are a short ride or drive away. 

The suite is on the same temperature control as the main part of the house, I am happy to make adjustments to make you more comfortable. There is a common staircase that connects the guest suite to the main home so you can interact with us as much as you prefer or we can keep our distance and let you enjoy your peace and quiet, it's really up to you!

The bathroom only has a shower, no bathtub is available in the space. 

We love having guests in our home and look forward to welcoming you to Bentonville!

FP
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
- Quiet Hours from 10 PM to 7 AM, please be mindful of our neighbors after dark.
- No unregistered guests on site or in the pool area, with no exceptions due to liability issues.

listingExpectations.addedDetails: Access to guest suite is at the rear of the house and is accessed using stepping stones.
listingExpectations.title: Must climb stairs
Security deposit - if you damage the home, you may be charged up to $200

listingExpectations.addedDetails: All interior guest spaces are private to you, but the outdoor spaces in the yard and the pool area are shared with our family. We have never had issues coordinating usage, but we may pass each other outside over the course of your stay.
listingExpectations.title: Some spaces are shared

listingExpectations.addedDetails: Security cameras cover each entrance of home, the house exterior, the non-guest areas and the pool area. None are placed inside the guest suite.
listingExpectations.title: Surveillance or recording devices on property
